infos.value: Though one must accumulate AP to use them, they hold immense power.
Now, I shall teach you how to further enhance your Limit Bursts.
Have you ever visited the Arena? For details, select Duel from the Home screen.
I have prepared the necessary materials, so go ahead and use them.
<color=#00ffff>Specific units</color> possess a powerful inherent ability called a <color=#00ffff>Limit Burst</color>.
Limit Bursts can only be enhanced with special items called <color=#00ffff>Burst Pots</color>.
Burst Pots can primarily be acquired as <color=#00ffff>Arena rewards</color>.
Proceed to a tutorial on Enhancing Limit Bursts?
